Music Discovery Tips

Listen Actively

Pay attention to the rhythm and percussion patterns. Cuban salsa has a distinctive clave rhythm that drives the dance.

Feel the Music

Dance is about expressing the music through movement. Let the rhythm guide your body and connect with the emotion.

Share & Discover

Share your favorite songs with fellow dancers and ask instructors for recommendations to expand your musical knowledge.

Practice Regularly

Use these playlists for regular practice at home. Consistent exposure to authentic Cuban music improves your timing and musicality.
